post:
Affordable Cloud Hosting For Everyone!
--------------------------------------
see below for 4% Discount


From QuadexHosting we'd like to show off some of our super affordable Cloud VPS plans, we'll try to include every detail we can and don't hesitate to leave a comment!

First off The plans on offer!:
Location: ***Toronto, Canada***

>1vCPU | 512MB RAM (879MB SWAP)|20GB SSD| 10Mbps Unlimited Transfer = 3.80/Month or $0.0057/hr


----------
>1vCPU | 512MB RAM (879MB SWAP)|20GB SSD| 100Mbps Unlimited Transfer =  5.70/Month or $0.008/hr

Test IP: 198.144.155.27 (Ping/Tracert)
[>Full Price List<](http://quadexhosting.com/plans-pricing/)

Operating Systems Available:
Full Root Access!
 - Windows 2008
 - CentOS 6 / CentOS 5
 - Debian 7
 - Ubuntu 12
 - rhel 6 / rhel 5

1vCPU|512MB|20GBSSD|100Mbps Test Results (freevps.us bench.sh)

  



    > CPU model :  QEMU Virtual CPU version (cpu64-rhel6)

Our test system will be kept online for a while, if you would like us to run a specific test comment below.
 


----------

**Review and Save Permanently! (4% Off All Servers For ever!)**
---------------------------------------------------------------

----------
From Now until 15/7/14 we will be running a program that gives our clients on lowendtalk the ability to earn a permanent account discount of 4%, all that needs doing is you make a Honest review of our hosting service, support, user panel, we dont mind if it shows us as a bad or good company, all that is required is that it is honest and constructive, once the review has been posted on a forum of your choosing simply open a support ticket your account with a link to your post, keep in mind to include your account ID/Name in your post so we can verify it belongs to you.


We provide Customer support via: Tickets, Email and Skype.

Website: [QuadexHosting][1]

Contact:

 - Email: support@quadexhosting.com
 - Skype: Rhys@quadexhosting
 - http://www.quadexhosting.com/contact

  
Limitations: These are your resources!, run whatever your heart desires but follow one simple rule, KEEP IT LEGAL, and we wont bother you.

  [1]: http://www.quadexhosting.com
